mapper.select: select * from article_type where parent_id is not null order by priority desc;

SELECT a.article_type_id, a.article_type_name, a.priority, a.article_type_create_time, a.article_type_last_edit_time, b.article_type_id as b_article_type_id, b.article_type_name as b_article_type_name, b.priority as b_priority, b.article_type_create_time as b_article_type_create_time, b.article_type_last_edit_time as b_article_type_last_edit_time FROM article_type as a left join article_type as b on a.parent_id=b.article_type_id where a.article_type_id=#{articleTypeId};
